issue.title: [CF 853] alpha flash + dual spec bug
issue.body:
Steps to reproduce the problem:
  1. Events > "On icon setup" animation > alpha flash > play indefinitely
  2. Group Settings > Unselect the unactive spec
  3. Switch between specs
Error log:

Components\IconModules\IconModule_Alpha\Alpha.lua:84: attempt to index local "IconModule_Alpha" (a nil value) Components\IconModules\IconModule_Alpha\Alpha.lua:84: in function "OnUpdate" Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:106: in function <Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:99> (tail call): ? <in C code> <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[4]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[4]":5 (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.2.3.lua:1440: in function "Fire" TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.2.3.lua:2636: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2578>

Locals: nil

Version:

TellMeWhen 6.2.3 (bug already present in previous build)

  • Icon (you must unselect unactive spec in group settings to be relevant): ^1^T^SType^Sitem ^SName^SHearthstone ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SFade^b ^SType^SAnimations ^SAnimation^SICONALPHAFLASH ^SEvent^SOnEventsRestored ^SInfinite^B ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N62309^S~~| ^Sicon^^`

It will block some animations (alpha/color flash, maybe more) in the "unactive spec"
